author: DarthVader_
title: Awesome!
review: This game is awesome!  It is better then the LEGO StarWars games.  It has alot of the same characteristics and other things but they did add alot of other things.  Such as swimming, digging, and others!  If you like LEGOs and Indy video games, this is the thing to get!

author: Shadow_Crawler
title: Oh, George, it's great!
review: This is AMAZING! I played it and reaching 11,1 % currently. It's very fun, and you can play various characters, including Indy in many outfits and styles,you also can make your own heroes. This is a must-buy for Indy / George Lucas' fans! Including the level for every indy lego set (except kingdom of crystal skull series)

author: Pepper
title: My first PS2 game...
review:
I got this in July as my first game for my sister and I's PS2. It's really fun. I must agree that it IS better than Lego Star Wars.

pros
includes new features such as:digging, swimming, fixing things with wrenches, Indy's whip, etc.
better short entrances than in Lego Star Wars
no completely vehicle oriented levels
locales from:Raiders of the Lost Ark, Temple of Doom, and The Last Crusade
lots of characters to unlock
bonus levels
secret characters
something awesome happens when you get 100%
mail
cool mini-models when you get all the artifacts in each level
awesome levels
funny cutscenes
Barnett College
you can pick up defeated enemy's weapons and use them

cons
no Kingdom of the Crystal Skull levels
some levels are really hard
some levels have unlimited bad guys

Overall, this is an awesome game. It is worth $40, but you might want to wait until it goes down in price.

author: Tri_pod_king
title: Much better than Lego Star Wars!
review:
I got this on the first day of summer vacation and I'll tell ya', it's a blast! I was worried that it'd be like Lego Star Wars, but it turned out it was a lot different. Although I must admit that you have to have seen the movies to know what to do. What I also liked about it is that when to people are playing it, they'll both probably want to play as Indiana Jones, so they might have an argument on who gets to be Indy. Well, not with this game. There are 9 different Indy's! And sure, $39.99 is a lot, but it's worth it! Although I'd still wait for the price to drop.
                                       -Tri-pod king

author: jonbuddy
title: Fabulous!
review:
I apologize for my very stupid review, "Way Too Cool!", and hope you will forget that one.

It is better than LEGO Star Wars, but harder.

Good:
Indy!
Raiders of the Lost Ark
Temple of Doom
Last Crusade
So many characters!
So many secrets! (Like _________ Characters, NO SPOILERS!)
So many different outfits!
Character Creator
Artifacts instead of Canisters/Minikits
Secret Stud-Filled Levels (Like Ancient City)

Bad:
No Kingdom of the Crystal Skull Levels (you can't blame them because it came out not a month after the movie)
Harder

Overall:
4.7/5
OR
8.7/10

author: jedi_master_kit_fisto
title: best game ever sort of!
review: its the best lego game I have ever played and all your favourite characters are there to play as. you can build lots of things and is really fun to play. some characters you can play as are henry jones , willie scott and many more. you can even make up your own characters!
